General.Name: T3EX Global Holdings Corp
General.Description: T3EX Global Holdings Corp., an investment holding company, provides integrated logistics services in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Midland China, East Asia, and internationally. It offers international freight forwarding services, such as ocean and air freight services. The company also provides domestic logistics services, including sea and air freight import/export customs clearance, bonded area customs clearance and filing for re-import/re-export, logistics park of export and import transit operations, hazardous goods or tank container customs clearance, remote customs clearance and declaration, customs seal clearance operations, and inspection and quarantine; and temporary warehousing for import and export goods, label replacement, sorting and repacking, pallet, warehouse space leasing, inventory management reports, and customized delivery services. It also provides supply chain solutions; e-commerce logistics solutions; and supply chain financing services. T3EX Global Holdings Corp. was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 563, Zhongxiao East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 11072
